meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Amanda Levreault Bucky McMahon Kyle Jones Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7824.

div.div: Kyle Jones game 7. Alex is clean-shaven.

td.p: Amanda Levreault, a production manager from Chicopee, Massachusetts
Bucky McMahon, an adventure travel writer from Tallahassee, Florida
Kyle Jones, a music teacher from Aurora, Colorado (whose 6-day cash winnings total $127,203)

tr.td: PRO FOOTBALL HALL OF FAMERS BY TEAM

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Amanda: What\'s Mars?)

the moon

')

div.h3: Scores at the first commercial break (after clue 15):

tr.td: (Jimmy: Some of the world's most inspiring art is in books and online.) (Kelly: But you can actually stand in front of it...)
ONLY AT THE METROPOLITAN MUSEUM OF ART

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_5_5', 'clue_DJ_5_5_stuck', 'An Australian Robin Hood to some, this Down Under bandit & bank robber was captured in 1880 & faced the hangman')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: An Australian Robin Hood to some, this Down Under bandit & bank robber was captured in 1880 & faced the hangman

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_6_5', 'clue_DJ_6_5_stuck', 'John Singer Sargent

Bucky
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_6_5', 'clue_DJ_6_5_stuck', '(Kelly of the Clue Crew presents from the Metropolitan Museum of Art.) Viewers in 1884 were shocked by that dress & ridiculed her deathly pallor; when this 3-named American artist sold the painting to the Met, he asked that the woman not be named, hence the title "Madame X"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Kelly of the Clue Crew presents from the Metropolitan Museum of Art.) Viewers in 1884 were shocked by that dress & ridiculed her deathly pallor; when this 3-named American artist sold the painting to the Met, he asked that the woman not be named, hence the title "Madame X"

tr.td: In legend, he called all the animals together but only 12 came, including a rat & a dragon
